title: Rare t207 brown ink Recruit Milan
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Rare t207 brown ink Recruit Milan
posts.post_content:
Posted By: jay behrens
Those that know me know I don't use the term rare very often, but that's what this card is. Offered is a t207 with a brown ink Recruit back. This was the first card graded by SGC as such. To the best of anyone's knowledge there are fewer of these cards than Red Cross back t207s. Asking price is $999 shipped and insured. I am also open to trades involving t205s or Delongs I need.

[IMG]http://i255.photobucket.com/albums/hh144/sabrjay/my%20collection/t207milan.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i255.photobucket.com/albums/hh144/sabrjay/my%20collection/t207milanb.jpg[/IMG]
Jay

The richest person is not the one who has the most, but the one who needs the least.
